Footer.tagline: Free online tools for developers, students, and professionals worldwide.

HomePage.heroSubtitle: A collection of useful, privacy-friendly tools. No sign-up required. Works in your browser, instantly.
HomePage.privacyFirstDesc: All calculations run in your browser. No data is ever sent to our servers.
HomePage.instantResultsDesc: No loading spinners. Results appear as you type with zero server roundtrips.
HomePage.worksEverywhereDesc: Mobile-friendly, no installation required. Just open and use.

metadata.title: ToolsShed - Free Online Tools
metadata.description: Free online tools for developers, students, and professionals. JSON Formatter, Base64, UUID Generator, Unit Converters, and more.

developer.name: Developer Tools
developer.description: Essential tools for developers: JSON, Base64, UUID, hashing, and more.

converters.name: Unit Converters
converters.description: Convert between units of length, weight, temperature, and more.

text.name: Text Tools
text.description: Tools for text manipulation, counting, and conversion.

finance.name: Finance Tools
finance.description: Calculators for interest, percentages, loans, and investments.

health.name: Health Tools
health.description: Health calculators for BMI, calories, and fitness metrics.

time.name: Time Tools
time.description: Time zone converters, age calculators, and date utilities.

math.name: Math Tools
math.description: Calculators for equations, number theory, and scientific computing.

unit-price-calculator.name: Unit Price Calculator
unit-price-calculator.description: Compare prices per unit to find the best deal between different package sizes.
unit-price-calculator.metaDescription: Compare unit prices to find the best deal. Enter price and quantity to calculate cost per unit.

cooking-converter.name: Cooking Unit Converter
cooking-converter.description: Convert between cups, tablespoons, teaspoons, milliliters, grams, and ounces for cooking.
cooking-converter.metaDescription: Convert cooking measurements: cups, tablespoons, teaspoons, milliliters, grams, and ounces. Free recipe converter.

time-unit-converter.name: Time Unit Converter
time-unit-converter.description: Convert between seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, and years.
time-unit-converter.metaDescription: Convert between seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, and years. Free online time unit converter.

log-calculator.name: Logarithm Calculator
log-calculator.description: Calculate logarithms in any base — natural log (ln), log base 10, or custom base.
log-calculator.metaDescription: Calculate log base 10, natural log (ln), log base 2, or any custom base. Free online logarithm calculator.

xml-formatter.name: XML Formatter
xml-formatter.description: Format, validate, and minify XML documents with syntax highlighting.
xml-formatter.metaDescription: Format, validate, and minify XML documents online. Free XML beautifier with syntax checking — works in your browser.

jwt-generator.name: JWT Generator
jwt-generator.description: Generate signed JWT tokens with custom header, payload, and secret key.
jwt-generator.metaDescription: Generate signed JWT tokens with custom payload and HS256 secret. Free browser-based JWT generator — no data sent to server.

text-statistics.name: Text Readability Analyzer
text-statistics.description: Analyze text readability with Flesch score, average sentence length, and more.
text-statistics.metaDescription: Analyze text readability with Flesch Reading Ease, Gunning Fog Index, and grade level scores.

speech-to-text.name: Speech to Text
speech-to-text.description: Convert speech to text using your browser's built-in voice recognition engine.
speech-to-text.metaDescription: Convert speech to text using your browser's built-in Web Speech API. Free, no upload required.

torque-converter.name: Torque Converter
torque-converter.description: Convert between Newton-meters, foot-pounds, kilogram-force meters, and more torque units.
torque-converter.metaDescription: Convert between Newton-meters, foot-pounds, kilogram-force meters, and other torque units. Free online torque converter.

illuminance-converter.name: Illuminance Converter
illuminance-converter.description: Convert between lux, foot-candle, and phot illuminance units.
illuminance-converter.metaDescription: Convert between lux, foot-candle, and phot illuminance units. Free online light intensity converter.

macro-calculator.name: Macro Calculator
macro-calculator.description: Calculate daily carbohydrate, protein, and fat targets based on your calorie goal.
macro-calculator.metaDescription: Calculate your daily macros — carbs, protein, and fat — based on your calorie goal and diet type.

menstrual-cycle-calculator.name: Menstrual Cycle Calculator
menstrual-cycle-calculator.description: Predict your next period and fertile window based on cycle length and last period date.
menstrual-cycle-calculator.metaDescription: Predict your next period date and fertile window based on your cycle length and last period start date.

tax-bracket-calculator.name: Tax Bracket Calculator
tax-bracket-calculator.description: Estimate US federal income tax, effective rate, and marginal rate for any income.
tax-bracket-calculator.metaDescription: Estimate your US federal income tax, effective tax rate, and marginal tax bracket for 2024.

stock-profit-calculator.name: Stock Profit Calculator
stock-profit-calculator.description: Calculate profit, loss, and return on investment for stock trades.
stock-profit-calculator.metaDescription: Calculate your stock trade profit, loss, and ROI. Enter buy and sell price with number of shares.

binary-calculator.name: Binary Calculator
binary-calculator.description: Perform arithmetic and bitwise operations on binary, decimal, and hexadecimal numbers.
binary-calculator.metaDescription: Perform binary arithmetic and bitwise operations (AND, OR, XOR, NOT, shift). Supports binary, decimal, and hex.

vector-calculator.name: Vector Calculator
vector-calculator.description: Calculate 2D and 3D vector addition, subtraction, dot product, cross product, and magnitude.
vector-calculator.metaDescription: Calculate 2D and 3D vector operations: addition, subtraction, dot product, cross product, and magnitude.

cipher-tool.name: Cipher Tool
cipher-tool.description: Encode and decode text with Caesar, ROT13, and Vigenère ciphers.
cipher-tool.metaDescription: Encode and decode text using Caesar cipher, ROT13, and Vigenère cipher. Free online cryptography tool.

mime-type-lookup.name: MIME Type Lookup
mime-type-lookup.description: Look up MIME types by file extension or find extensions for a given MIME type.
mime-type-lookup.metaDescription: Look up MIME content types by file extension (jpg, pdf, mp4...) or search by MIME type. Free reference tool.

frequency-converter.name: Frequency Converter
frequency-converter.description: Convert between Hz, kHz, MHz, GHz, THz, and RPM.
frequency-converter.metaDescription: Convert between Hertz, Kilohertz, Megahertz, Gigahertz, Terahertz, and RPM. Free online frequency converter.

shoe-size-converter.name: Shoe Size Converter
shoe-size-converter.description: Convert shoe sizes between US, EU, UK, Japan, and centimeters.
shoe-size-converter.metaDescription: Convert shoe sizes between US, EU, UK, Japan (cm) systems for men and women. Free online shoe size chart.

nato-alphabet.name: NATO Phonetic Alphabet
nato-alphabet.description: Convert text to NATO phonetic alphabet for clear communication.
nato-alphabet.metaDescription: Convert any text to NATO phonetic alphabet (Alpha, Bravo, Charlie...). Used in aviation, military, and phone spelling.

unicode-inspector.name: Unicode Inspector
unicode-inspector.description: Inspect any character's Unicode code point, name, category, and HTML entity.
unicode-inspector.metaDescription: Inspect Unicode characters: view code points (U+XXXX), names, categories, and HTML entities for any text.

fire-calculator.name: FIRE Calculator
fire-calculator.description: Calculate your Financial Independence number and years to retirement.
fire-calculator.metaTitle: FIRE Calculator — Financial Independence & Early Retirement
fire-calculator.metaDescription: Calculate your FIRE number using the 4% rule and find out how many years until you can retire early.

dividend-calculator.name: Dividend Calculator
dividend-calculator.description: Calculate dividend yield, annual income, and monthly income from stock dividends.
dividend-calculator.metaDescription: Calculate dividend yield, annual dividend income, and monthly income from your stock investments.

due-date-calculator.name: Pregnancy Due Date Calculator
due-date-calculator.description: Calculate your estimated due date and track key pregnancy milestones.
due-date-calculator.metaDescription: Calculate your estimated due date using Naegele's rule. Track trimester progress and key pregnancy milestones.

one-rep-max-calculator.name: One Rep Max Calculator
one-rep-max-calculator.description: Estimate your 1RM maximum lift using Epley, Brzycki, and other formulas.
one-rep-max-calculator.metaDescription: Estimate your one rep max (1RM) using Epley, Brzycki, Lander, and Lombardi formulas. Generate a training percentage table.

geometry-calculator.name: Geometry Calculator
geometry-calculator.description: Calculate area, perimeter, and volume of circles, rectangles, triangles, and more.
geometry-calculator.metaDescription: Calculate area, perimeter, circumference, and volume for circles, rectangles, triangles, spheres, cylinders, and cones.

ohm-law-calculator.name: Ohm's Law Calculator
ohm-law-calculator.description: Calculate voltage, current, resistance, and power using Ohm's Law.
ohm-law-calculator.metaDescription: Calculate voltage (V), current (I), resistance (R), and power (P) using Ohm's Law V=IR. Free electronics calculator.

color-blindness-simulator.name: Color Blindness Simulator
color-blindness-simulator.description: Preview how colors appear to people with different types of color vision deficiency.
color-blindness-simulator.metaDescription: Simulate deuteranopia, protanopia, tritanopia, and achromatopsia. Preview colors as seen by people with color vision deficiency.

json-diff.name: JSON Diff
json-diff.description: Compare two JSON objects and highlight added, removed, and changed keys.
json-diff.metaDescription: Compare two JSON objects side by side and highlight added, removed, and changed keys. Free browser-based JSON diff tool.

number-formatter.name: Number Formatter
number-formatter.description: Format numbers as currency, percentage, scientific notation, or with custom separators.
number-formatter.metaDescription: Format numbers as currency, percentage, scientific notation, or with custom thousand and decimal separators. Free online number formatter.

pace-converter.name: Pace Converter
pace-converter.description: Convert running pace between min/km, min/mile, km/h, and mph.
pace-converter.metaDescription: Convert running pace between min/km, min/mile, km/h, and mph. Free online pace calculator for runners.

clothing-size-converter.name: Clothing Size Converter
clothing-size-converter.description: Convert clothing sizes between US, EU, UK, Japan, and international standards.
clothing-size-converter.metaDescription: Convert clothing sizes between US, EU, UK, and Japan for tops, bottoms, and dresses. Free international clothing size chart.

word-wrap.name: Word Wrap
word-wrap.description: Wrap long text at a specified column width, with word or character break options.
word-wrap.metaDescription: Wrap long lines of text at a specified column width. Choose word-break or character-break mode. Free online text wrapping tool.

currency-formatter.name: Currency Formatter
currency-formatter.description: Format numbers in currency styles for USD, EUR, JPY, GBP, KRW, and more.
currency-formatter.metaDescription: Format numbers as currency for USD, EUR, JPY, GBP, KRW, and many more. Preview locale-aware currency display. Free online currency formatter.

date-calculator.name: Date Calculator
date-calculator.description: Add or subtract days, weeks, months, or years from any date.
date-calculator.metaDescription: Add or subtract days, weeks, months, or years from any date. Find a future or past date easily. Free online date calculator.

UuidGenerator.infoText: UUIDs are generated using crypto.randomUUID() (v4) — cryptographically random, generated entirely in your browser.

Base64Tool.infoText: Supports Unicode text. Encoding/decoding happens entirely in your browser — no data is sent to any server.

HashGenerator.disclaimer: MD5 is computed client-side. SHA-256 and SHA-512 use the browser's native crypto.subtle API. No data leaves your browser.

JwtDecoder.notVerifiedNote: This tool only decodes the JWT — it does NOT verify the signature. Never share sensitive tokens.

AboutPage.title: About ToolsShed
AboutPage.subtitle: Free, fast, and privacy-friendly tools — no sign-up, no data collection.
AboutPage.whatIsText: ToolsShed is a growing collection of free online tools for developers, students, and professionals. Whether you need to format JSON, convert units, generate a password, or calculate compound interest — it's all here, free, and instant.
AboutPage.privacyFirstDesc: Every tool runs entirely in your browser. Nothing you type is ever sent to a server.
AboutPage.noFrictionDesc: No sign-up, no account, no paywall. Open the tool and use it instantly.
AboutPage.builtForEveryoneDesc: Country-neutral tools that work the same whether you're in New York, London, or Tokyo.
AboutPage.techStackText: ToolsShed is built with modern, open-source technologies:
AboutPage.techNext: Next.js 16 — React framework with static site generation
AboutPage.openSourceText: ToolsShed is open source. Found a bug? Want to suggest a tool? Contributions are welcome.

metadata.title: About
metadata.description: Learn about ToolsShed — a collection of free, privacy-friendly online tools.

JwtGenerator.warningLabel: ⚠ For testing only — never expose real secrets.

LogCalculator.invalidBase: Base must be a positive number ≠ 1.

NotFound.title: Tool Not Found
NotFound.description: The tool you're looking for doesn't exist yet — but we're always adding more!

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.overviewText1: ToolsShed ("we", "us", or "our") operates the website tools-shed.com. This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information when you use our service.
PrivacyPage.overviewText2: The short version: All tools on ToolsShed run entirely in your browser. We do not store, transmit, or process any data you enter into our tools on our servers.
PrivacyPage.noCollectText: ToolsShed tools operate entirely client-side. This means:
PrivacyPage.noCollectItem1: Text you paste into JSON Formatter, Base64, or any other tool
PrivacyPage.noCollectItem2: Passwords generated by the Password Generator
PrivacyPage.noCollectItem3: Health data entered into the BMI Calculator
PrivacyPage.noCollectItem5: Any other input you provide to our tools
PrivacyPage.noCollectFooter: None of this data ever leaves your device or is sent to any server.
PrivacyPage.analyticsText1: We use Google Analytics 4 to understand how visitors interact with our site (e.g., which tools are most popular, how long visitors stay, which countries visitors come from). This data is anonymous and aggregated.
PrivacyPage.analyticsOptOut: Google Analytics uses cookies. You can opt out by installing the
PrivacyPage.adsenseText1: We use Google AdSense to display advertisements. Google AdSense uses cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits to our website or other websites on the internet.
PrivacyPage.adsenseText2: Google's use of advertising cookies enables it and its partners to serve ads based on your visit to our site and/or other sites on the internet. You may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting
PrivacyPage.commentsText1: Our comment system is powered by Giscus, which stores comments as GitHub Discussions. If you choose to leave a comment, you must sign in with a GitHub account. Your comment and GitHub profile information will be publicly visible on GitHub.
PrivacyPage.cookiesText: We use the following types of cookies:
PrivacyPage.thirdPartyText: Our website may contain links to external sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any external sites you visit.
PrivacyPage.childrenText: ToolsShed is not directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
PrivacyPage.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last updated" date. Continued use of the site after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
PrivacyPage.contactText1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please open an issue on our

metadata.description: Privacy Policy for ToolsShed — how we handle your data.

ColorBlindnessSimulator.aboutDesc: Color vision deficiency (color blindness) affects approximately 8% of males and 0.5% of females worldwide. This tool simulates how images appear to people with different types of color vision deficiency.
